channel.title: Teleport Glitch
channel.description:
Source Used: Pimpscape
Hi,
When I teleport on my server I do the start of the emote, (go smaller) then I appear at the place I teleported to but i am still stuck as a tiny person...
How do i fix this?
thanks,
- toon

item.description:

lol i think that would be a cool, but to fix this i would think you would have to go into your config (CFG) folder, and change around some stuff in the teleport.cfg folder. (now im not sure atm cuz im not at home, but i will help when i get home)
